analytic.title: The Genesis Texts of Jacob of Edessa: A Study in Variety

monogr.title: Text, Translation, and Tradition: Studies on the Peshitta and its Use in the Syriac Tradition Presented to Konrad D. Jenner on the Occasion of his Sixty-Fifth Birthday

body.bibl: Salvesen, Alison. “The Genesis Texts of Jacob of Edessa: A Study in Variety.” In Text, Translation, and Tradition: Studies on the Peshitta and Its Use in the Syriac Tradition Presented to Konrad D. Jenner on the Occasion of His Sixty-Fifth Birthday, edited by Wido Th van Peursen and Robert Bas ter Haar Romeny, 177–88. Monographs of the Peshiṭta Institute Leiden 14. Leiden: Brill, 2006.

Alison Salvesen, The Genesis Texts of Jacob of Edessa: A Study in Variety, in Text, Translation, and Tradition: Studies on the Peshitta and Its Use in the Syriac Tradition Presented to Konrad D. Jenner on the Occasion of His Sixty-Fifth Birthday, ed. Wido Th van Peursen and Robert Bas ter Haar Romeny, Monographs of the Peshiṭta Institute Leiden 14 (Leiden: Brill, 2006), 177–88.
